role_description: An Ansible role that installs Wails (a lightweight framework that helps build Desktop applications using Go) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Wails](https://github.com/wailsapp/wails) offers a different approach to providing web interfaces to Go programs: it provides the ability to wrap both Go code and a web frontend into a single binary.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Wails (a lightweight framework that helps build Desktop applications using Go) on nearly any platform.
